text: Greg Croudis (born 14 January 1993) is a New Zealand cricketer. He made his List A debut for Otago on 15 January 2017 in the 2016–17 Ford Trophy. He made his first-class debut for Otago on 21 March 2017 in the 2016–17 Plunket Shield season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Otago cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Greg Croudis
